titles.title: Opposing kleptocracy around the world and supporting efforts to develop an effective, independent International Anti-Corruption Court.
Opposing kleptocracy around the world and supporting efforts to develop an effective, independent International Anti-Corruption Court.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the House of Representatives' opposition to kleptocracy and grand corruption and its support for U.S. efforts to engage in the development of an International Anti-Corruption Court.
